capabilities.name: Strategy Map
capabilities.requirement: Build and maintain a quarterly strategy map for {function}.
capabilities.trigger: A new planning cycle starts in {domain}.
capabilities.output: A ranked strategy map with owners, risks, and milestones.

capabilities.name: Goal Tree
capabilities.requirement: Translate company goals into a measurable goal tree for {function}.
capabilities.trigger: Leadership asks for clearer KPI alignment in {domain}.
capabilities.output: A goal tree mapping company goals to team KPIs.
capabilities.kpi: Percent of KPIs traceable to company goals.

capabilities.name: Operating Plan
capabilities.requirement: Create a 90-day operating plan for {function}.
capabilities.trigger: A team needs a quarter execution plan in {domain}.
capabilities.output: A 90-day operating plan with dependencies and deadlines.
capabilities.kpi: Plan execution completion rate by milestone.

capabilities.name: Budget Allocator
capabilities.requirement: Allocate budget across initiatives in {function} using expected impact.
capabilities.trigger: Budget planning or reforecast is requested for {domain}.
capabilities.output: Budget allocation table with expected ROI per initiative.
capabilities.kpi: Variance between expected and realized ROI.

capabilities.name: Hiring Plan
capabilities.requirement: Define a hiring plan that supports priority outcomes in {function}.
capabilities.trigger: Headcount planning is requested for {domain}.
capabilities.output: Role plan with timing, scorecards, and hiring owner.

capabilities.name: Roadmap Prioritization
capabilities.requirement: Prioritize work in {function} with clear cost-impact tradeoffs.
capabilities.trigger: Backlog grows beyond delivery capacity in {domain}.
capabilities.output: Prioritized roadmap with rationale and cut lines.
capabilities.kpi: High-priority delivery rate and cycle-time stability.

capabilities.name: Workflow Design
capabilities.requirement: Design a standard workflow for repeatable work in {function}.
capabilities.trigger: Manual handoffs cause delays in {domain}.
capabilities.output: Workflow spec with states, owners, and SLAs.

capabilities.name: SOP Library
capabilities.requirement: Create and maintain SOPs for critical motions in {function}.
capabilities.trigger: Execution quality varies across operators in {domain}.
capabilities.output: Versioned SOP library with audit history.
capabilities.kpi: SOP adoption rate and defect reduction.

capabilities.name: Automation Backlog
capabilities.requirement: Build an automation backlog ranked by impact in {function}.
capabilities.trigger: The team asks what to automate next in {domain}.
capabilities.output: Automation backlog with effort, risk, and impact score.

capabilities.name: Agent Orchestration
capabilities.requirement: Orchestrate AI agents for high-volume workflows in {function}.
capabilities.trigger: Workload spikes require parallel automation in {domain}.
capabilities.output: Agent workflow graph with fallback and retry policy.
capabilities.kpi: Autonomous completion rate without human escalation.

capabilities.name: Data Contracts
capabilities.requirement: Define enforceable data contracts used by {function}.
capabilities.trigger: Upstream data changes repeatedly break workflows in {domain}.
capabilities.output: Data contract registry with schema and ownership.

capabilities.name: KPI Dashboard
capabilities.requirement: Build a live KPI dashboard for {function}.
capabilities.trigger: Leaders ask for real-time visibility in {domain}.
capabilities.output: Automated KPI dashboard with drill-downs.
capabilities.kpi: Dashboard freshness and decision adoption rate.

capabilities.name: Anomaly Detection
capabilities.requirement: Monitor metrics and detect anomalies in {function}.
capabilities.trigger: Unexpected swings are observed in {domain} KPIs.
capabilities.output: Alert pipeline with anomaly diagnostics.
capabilities.kpi: Mean time to detect KPI anomalies.

capabilities.name: Forecast Engine
capabilities.requirement: Forecast outcomes for {function} with confidence bands.

capabilities.name: Scenario Planning
